text: Jamie D. McCourt (born December 5, 1953)U.S. Public Records Index Vol 2 (Provo, UT: Ancestry.com Operations, Inc.), 2010. is a businesswoman and investor. She is the founder and CEO of Jamie Enterprises, and the former co- ownerDodgers welcome the McCourt era , Los Angeles Dodgers, January 29, 2004.Jamie McCourt wins court ruling, ESPN, December 7, 2010. and executive of the Los Angeles Dodgers. She became the highest-ranking woman in Major League Baseball, appointed first as Vice Chairman of the Dodgers in 2004, then President in 2005, and finally CEO in 2009.Jamie McCourt gets Dodgers promotion, USA Today, March 17, 2009. On June 22, 2017, she was nominated as United States Ambassador to Belgium.Trump nominates former Dodgers co-owner Jamie McCourt as ambassador to Belgium, Los Angeles Times, June 23, 2017. On August 2, 2017, President Trump formally withdrew her nomination and instead nominated her as United States Ambassador to France and United States Ambassador to Monaco. This nomination was confirmed by the United States Senate on November 2, 2017. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Ambassadors of the United States to France Category:Businesspeople from Baltimore Category:Politicians from Baltimore Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Jamie McCourt
